experience.title: Retail Sales Associate
responsibilities: Greeted customers and provided personalized product recommendations based on their style preferences and needs.
Maintained an in-depth knowledge of current promotions, return policies, and inventory availability.
Processed cash, credit, and mobile payments accurately using the POS system while maintaining a balanced drawer.
Organized sales floor merchandise and designed window displays to attract foot traffic and enhance brand image.

experience.title: Retail Sales Intern
responsibilities: Assisted senior sales staff in high-volume departments to ensure customer satisfaction during peak shopping hours.
Monitored fitting rooms and proactively offered alternative sizes or colors to shoppers.
Performed inventory replenishment and tagging of new arrivals to maintain a fully stocked sales floor.
Participated in weekly team meetings to discuss sales targets and customer service strategies.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
